titles.title: Panama Canal Amendments Act of 1994
To amend the Panama Canal Act of 1979 to reconstitute the Panama Canal Commission as a United States Government corporation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2126)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

bill.summary: 10/6/1994--Introduced. Panama Canal Amendments Act of 1994 - Amends the Panama Canal Act of 1979 to reestablish the Panama Canal Commission as a wholly owned government corporation within the executive branch.
